Detailed Description

Verbose.

Class for doing logging and some command line ui.

void Verbose::setLevel ( int  level  )  [static]

Set the level of verbosity desired.

0 == no messages 1 == normal messages, 2,3,4, etc. == more verbose.

Parameters:
level - level of verbosity desired.
